quote: Someone controls your life, so what? Put some wins under your belt and turn the tables. It's no reason to give up your ambitions!
author: Itsuki Sumeragi

quote: I despise people who move the goalposts because they think they can't win.
author: Yumeko Jabami

quote: As they say, the less you know, the better you sleep.
author: Runa Yomozuki

quote: The amount of money one owns ultimately decides the victor. It's a rule that forms the basis of a capitalist society!
author: Yumeko Jabami

quote: All according to plan then, huh? But you know, every time things look like they're gonna go well, there's definitely always trouble moving in the background.
author: Runa Yomozuki

quote: I dislike situations where I know for sure if I'm going to win or lose. Because it's not really gambling.
author: Yumeko Jabami

quote: They say humans are irrational creatures... gambling doesn't get them anything, they only lose something. But even so, we still gamble. We do that because we enjoy the risk.
author: Kirari Momobami

quote: To make your ambitions come true, you have to take risks.
author: Yumeko Jabami

quote: You're finally granted a chance to get even! And if you don't take it... then you're no better than a puppy who cowers when someone takes the leash off.
author: Yumeko Jabami

quote: My life is mine! They can't have it!
author: Mary Saotome

quote: Friends assist each other in times of need, do they not?
author: Yumeko Jabami

quote: Gambling doesn't get them anything, they only lose something. But even so, we still gamble. We do that because we enjoy the risk.
author: Kirari Momobami

quote: How much do we bet to start?
author: Yumeko Jabami
